line_1: Exalt; but be thyself what they record.
line_2: Who dare excel, thy fost'ring aid afford;

line_1: And deathless Honour all thy Acts record.
line_2: May New Successes wait upon thy Sword,

line_1: And fell as martyrs on record,
line_2: With slaught'ring arms, the gun and sword,

line_1: And fell as martyrs on record,
line_2: Of tyranny aveng'd, and liberty restor'd.

line_1: There her soft vows unceasing love record,
line_2: Queen of the bright seraglio of her Lord. —

line_1: I've forg'd a tale, or alter'd a record;
line_2: Nor think that here, in hatred to a Lord,

line_1: What page of human annals can record
line_2: A deed so bright as human rights restor'd?

line_1: Say, shall I praise th' escutcheon's proud record,
line_2: When a lost Brutus sinks into a lord?
